1 tablespoon olive oil,1 onion, chopped,1 green bell pepper, chopped,1 red bell pepper, chopped,1 pound skinless, boneless chicken breast, chopped,2 tablespoons water,1 (1.12 ounce) package fajita seasoning mix,8 flour tortillas,2 cups shredded Mexican cheese blend,4 tablespoons sour cream, for serving,4 tablespoons pico de gallo, or to taste,2 tablespoons chopped fresh cilantro, for garnish,,
